title: [Self-directed] Organizational Learning Capability Strengthening Program through Lean Office

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in public sector administrative tasks and basic understanding of organizational process improvement
context.additional_context: Current professionals learn organizational learning strategies directly applicable to their work environments, systematically progressing from theoretical analysis to case studies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze knowledge-creation processes within organizations using lean office tools (e.g., work cells, value stream maps).
Learners can apply the Kaizen (continuous improvement) methodology to identify inefficiencies in work processes and propose improvement measures.
Learners can develop a practical plan to design a team-level learning culture based on the organizational learning framework (Argote & Miron-Spektor, 2011).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
